description: 共同科英文（二）課程為一學期兩學分課程，係為非英語系學生所開設的課程。目標在幫助大一學生活用中學時期所累積的英語知識，提昇英語聽、說、讀、寫整體的溝通能力。為達此目標，本課程要求教師盡量用英語上課，努力營造一個豐富的英語環境，讓學生不但有充分機會以英語參與課堂活動，且樂於使用英語與同學及老師溝通。
goals: 1. 增進學生英語溝通表達能力 2. 透過參與課程活動促進團隊精神 3. 透過多面向英語閱讀促使學生了解多元文化，拓展學生國際化視野 4. 透過課堂討論培養批判精神 5. 提升學生英語學習動機及自主學習興趣

**Instructor: Susan Su 蘇鈺恩**

-----------------------------------------------------

**教學目標****Objectives:**

  This course aims to help students to develop and improve their English abilities; meanwhile, it also helps to build up students’ confidence and interests in English. Student’s participation, discussion, and group activities in class will be the core of this course. **Oral speaking and self-presentation in English would be the main focus for this semester. Students will be trained to deliver their ideas/opinions in English; meanwhile, students are required to do their own English presentation in this semester**.

Different activities will be offered to guide the students to apply basic English vocabularies, sentences, and grammar to build the familiarity toward English, including using different kinds of visual aids, games, and news...etc. Students will engage in different discussion and practice under the instructor’s guide to improve students’ English speaking, listening, writing, and reading abilities. In addition to understanding the grammar and vocabulary, students are required to have further critical thinking toward the issues, subjects, and contents given in class.

**上課要求與規則****Requirements and Rules:**

1.  **Your learning attitude is essential in this class**. You need to focus both on your attendance and class activities. Without joining any class activities, discussion, or practice, you won’t get a higher score for this class. **(****學習態度為本評分重點****，****沒有盡力參與課堂活動、討論或練習不會獲得高分****)**
2.  **You’ll be asked to mainly speak in English during the class as much as you can for this semester, but you can ask for help in Chinese sometimes**. (**本學期將以同學的英文表達為主，故會要求同學以英文發言**)
3.  **Missing 4 classes, without telling your teacher in advance( at least “a week” before your absence or by e-mail with proof) with a proper reason, you will be failed for this class. Please note that if you’re late for more than 20 minutes, you’ll be absent for that class. For 1 absence, it costs you 2 points every time****. (****\*****同學若不能前來上課，請一定要自己_主動_告知老師****(e-mail****或事前告知****)****，只請同學代為轉告不代表請假。請注意，請假須有正當合理理由或證明；缺席四次，在沒有以正當理由事先告知老師下，將無法通過此課程。遲到超過****20****分鐘視同缺席。缺席一次扣****2****分****)**
4.  **Textbook is a must**. **Violation of this rule will cost you 1 point (out of your final score) each time**. (**You can bring no textbook ONLY when the teacher informs you!**) **(****請依老師的指示帶課本****。****沒帶課本，每次扣總成績一分。****)**
5.  **Lexile****後測日期****: 109****年****5****月****4****日至****5****月****29****日** **(****實際測試時間將會提前通知同學****)**
6.  **3-minutes English Presentation****三分鐘英文簡報**: We don’t have midterm exam; instead, you need to give an individual 3-minutes English presentation.
7.  **Final presentation of personal interview****期末個人英文訪談****:** **You’ll have an individual interview with your teacher in English for 8 minutes**. Interview questions will be given in advanced. While you’re having the interview, **you can’t read or bring any scripts/notes**. Just have a chat with your teacher.
8.  You **cannot** use your laptop or smart phone in class **without the teacher’s permission**. Violation of this rule will cost you **2** points each time. (**電子產品只能依老師指示時使用，上課違規使用電子產品每次扣****2****分**)
9.  **Please check Moodle and e-mail frequently! Forgetting to check any notice is NOT an excuse for any class activities.** It’s your responsibility to make sure you register with the correct email address on Moodle. **(****請隨時查看****Moodle****及老師寄的****e-mail!****不知道或忘了查看任何通知而未作規定事項視同扣分。****)**
10.  **Please RESPECT your classmates, your teacher, and this class. Any serious violation of this class might cause great outcome on your final score. If you have any problems/questions, you are always welcome to talk to your teacher.**

**額外加分****Extra bonus:**

**A. Extra bonus**: Joining Oral Reading Competition (英文朗讀比賽) will gain **5 points** for your final score. (each class needs to have 3 students)

**補救活動****Makeup activities:**

**B. Extra bonus and make up activities:** If you have a bad performance in class, including your learning attitude, attendance, presentation, class participation, **you final presentation of personal interview will last for 15 minutes, and you’ll be the last one to get the interview**. **You need to perform and prepare well for your interview with the extra questions, so there might be some chances for you to pass this course**.
